org.apache.samoa.moa

Class AbstractMOAObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MOAObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractErrorWeightedVote, AbstractOptionHandler, ADWIN, AttributeSplitSuggestion, BasicClassificationPerformanceEvaluator, BasicRegressionPerformanceEvaluator, Cluster, Clustering, DoubleVector, GaussianEstimator, GreenwaldKhannaQuantileSummary, InstanceConditionalTest, LearningCurve, LearningEvaluation, MeasureCollection, Measurement, Rule, WindowClassificationPerformanceEvaluator

    public abstract class AbstractMOAObject
extends Object
implements MOAObject
    Abstract MOA Object. All classes that are serializable, copiable, can measure its size, and can give a description, extend this class.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
